757b9a6e-11f1-4068-8f8d-b48743414606.description: The Meta Certified Digital Marketing Associate credential is awarded to entry-level digital marketers who have foundational proficiency in the skills, tools, advertising policies and best practices required to buy ads on the Facebook App, Instagram and Messenger.
757b9a6e-11f1-4068-8f8d-b48743414606.name: Meta Certified Digital Marketing Associate

badge_template_activities.title: 100-101: Meta Certified Digital Marketing Associate exam measures a person’s competency in foundational-level functions and value propositions of Facebook, Instagram and Messenger. People who take this exam are expected to identify the different platforms that make up Meta solutions and communicate the value proposition for businesses. They are also expected to identify the steps to establish a business presence, advertising fundamentals and read reporting.
Maintain certification every 24 months by retaking the current version of the Meta Certified Digital Marketing Associate exam or any professional level Meta certification.

endorsements.description: This credential has been successfully evaluated by the American Council on Education for college credit. It is recommended for a total of 1 college credit. For more information about ACE Learning Evaluations, visit www.acenet.edu.

d6078f92-6b36-469f-9cda-b4a53a2122ce.description: Meta Certification is a credentialing program for digital advertising professionals who demonstrate advanced proficiency in Meta marketing. The Meta Certified Media Buying Professional credential is awarded to digital advertising professionals who are proficient in the skills, tools, advertising policies and best practices required to buy ads on the Facebook app, Instagram and Messenger.
d6078f92-6b36-469f-9cda-b4a53a2122ce.name: Meta Certified Media Buying Professional

badge_template_activities.title: 410-101: Meta Certified Media Buying Professional. This exam measures advanced-level competency in managing, creating and purchasing ads, ad buying types, improving performance and delivery via the ad auction, troubleshooting ad issues, mapping ad formats to advertising objectives, audience targeting, reporting, mapping KPIs to buying objectives, understanding and testing the Meta pixel, SDK, offline conversions and campaign measurement.
Maintain your credentials on an annual basis by completing activities that qualify for recertification, such as retaking the current version of the Meta Certified Media Buying Professional exam.

0c6ce5cf-f91f-4b1b-aabb-56f8abfe4626.description: Meta Certification is a credentialing program for digital advertising professionals who demonstrate advanced proficiency in Meta marketing solutions. The Meta Certified Media Planning Professional credential is awarded to digital advertising professionals who demonstrate proficiency in designing an end-to-end Meta marketing strategy that aligns to business goals and complements a holistic marketing plan.
0c6ce5cf-f91f-4b1b-aabb-56f8abfe4626.name: Meta Certified Media Planning Professional

badge_template_activities.title: 400-101: Meta Certified Media Planning Professional. This exam measures advanced-level competency in making informed media recommendations that align to business goals. This is inclusive of assessing data, insights and past performance to inform campaign plans, recommend advertising objectives, target audiences, placements, formats, budgets and measurement frameworks on the Facebook app, Messenger and Instagram.
Maintain your credentials on an annual basis by completing activities that qualify for recertification, such as retaking the current version of the Meta Certified Media Planning Professional exam.

d813357b-4be7-40d4-b72e-7b6041aaa220.description: Meta Certification is a credentialing program for digital advertising professionals who demonstrate foundational knowledge and best practices in Meta marketing solutions. The Meta Certified Creative Strategy Professional credential is awarded to digital advertising professionals who demonstrate proficiency in developing effective mobile creative strategy and creative briefs.
d813357b-4be7-40d4-b72e-7b6041aaa220.name: Meta Certified Creative Strategy Professional

badge_template_activities.title: This exam is designed to certify those who demonstrate advanced competencies in developing effective creative strategy and creative briefs. The exam will target candidates’ abilities to understand, apply, analyze, and evaluate Meta's mobile creative strategy. Candidates should be able to develop briefs for a creative team based on research and insights and improve the quality of mobile work in the industry by quantifying and operationally defining standards for content on the platform.
Maintain your credentials on an annual basis by completing activities that qualify for recertification, such as retaking the current version of the Meta Certified Creative Strategy Professional exam.

a29efa3d-03ee-4227-ad51-f15565d02d16.description: The Meta Social Media Marketing Professional Certificate, hosted by Coursera, represents the skills for jobs in social media marketing fields, as well as the soft skills needed for career support for the job search. This program will introduce you to social media, develop an understanding of digital marketing and establish your presence. No formal education required.
a29efa3d-03ee-4227-ad51-f15565d02d16.name: Meta Social Media Marketing Professional Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Obtain the Meta Certified Digital Marketing Associate Certification and maintain certification every 24 months by passing the current version of the Meta Certified Digital Marketing Associate exam.
Complete 5 self-paced courses. This program takes place online, so you can learn from anywhere, at any time.

endorsements.description: This credential has been successfully evaluated by the American Council on Education for college credit. It is recommended for a total of 2 college credits. For more information about ACE Learning Evaluations, visit www.acenet.edu.

d3176254-0d11-47f3-ad61-ad68927ffc40.description: Meta Discovery Commerce Specialists are experts at using Meta to generate demand, by bringing together the tools needed to help a business grow. These skills will help deliver personalized experiences, expressive creative formats, frictionless purchases, and impactful measurement.
d3176254-0d11-47f3-ad61-ad68927ffc40.name: Meta Certified Discovery Commerce Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Meta Certified Media Buying Professional

Complete courses that showcase key tactics and tools needed to turn discovery into demand. After completing this path, learners will be able to deliver personalized experiences, expressive creative formats, frictionless purchases, and impactful measurement.
Pass an assessment upon completing the learning path.

f2dec444-8da0-4c5d-a5de-18af01ff431e.description: The Meta Certified Community Manager certification is awarded to candidates who demonstrate a foundational proficiency in community-building strategies, and knowledge of the skills and tools needed to lead, moderate, and engage an online community.
f2dec444-8da0-4c5d-a5de-18af01ff431e.name: Meta Certified Community Manager

badge_template_activities.title: 600-101: The Meta Certified Community Manager certification exam measures the advanced comprehension and strategic application of best practices and standards for online community management. People who take this exam possess the required digital skills to build, manage, and grow online communities, and have knowledge of the policies and regulations related both to their own verticals, as well as platform policies and regulations.
To earn this badge, people must (1) pass the exam and (2) acknowledge adherence to Meta's Community Standards.
Maintain certification every 24 months by retaking the current version of the Meta Certified Community Manager exam.
Join this exclusive group for those who have successfully passed the Meta Certified Community Manager Certification, and is a space to discuss, share and connect.

5cb7e218-0f26-4e78-801c-d0fb189d71d3.description: The Meta Certified Marketing Science Professional credential is awarded to professionals who have proven advanced competency in using data, insights, and measurement to make marketing recommendations.
5cb7e218-0f26-4e78-801c-d0fb189d71d3.name: Meta Certified Marketing Science Professional

badge_template_activities.title: 200-101: A Meta Certified Marketing Science Professional can consult on measurement strategies and execute research. This individual possesses statistics knowledge and data manipulation skills. They’ve demonstrated the ability to formulate an appropriate measurement approach, use analytic tools to query data, apply common statistical concepts, and apply novel measurement techniques.
Keep your certification up to date every 12 months by retaking the current version of the Meta Certified Marketing Science Professional exam.

0466bf30-eefa-444f-b104-ea6006193a0f.description: Meta Certification is the highest level of accreditation that Meta recognizes. This certification is designed to identify professionals who demonstrate advanced proficiency in Meta technology and products. The Meta Certified Marketing Developer credential is awarded to professionals who are proficient in the technical implementation of marketing solutions.
0466bf30-eefa-444f-b104-ea6006193a0f.name: Meta Certified Marketing Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 500-101 exam, a multiple choice exam that measures proficiency in setting up and troubleshooting Meta pixel, catalog, dynamic ads, custom conversions, and advanced matching
Pass the 500-201 coding exercise, a practical coding assessment that measures proficiency in installing the Meta pixel

1d5ceb1d-c24b-428c-a7eb-048849c5a2d3.description: The Meta Front-End Developer Certificate is awarded to learners who complete a series of courses on front-end web development, hosted by Coursera. With a focus on React.js, these rigorous, self-paced courses, developed by Meta experts, prepare a candidate for an entry level job as a front-end developer. The courses culminate in the successful completion of a capstone project.
1d5ceb1d-c24b-428c-a7eb-048849c5a2d3.name: Meta Front-End Developer Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Candidates are required to complete all self-paced courses on Coursera and complete and pass a capstone project.

b5db1b1d-bd21-4a33-8fe6-d5303a42bdbe.description: Meta Blueprint is Meta's global education program for digital advertising professionals. The Meta Trainer Network badge holder is a valued partner who delivers training to people within their respective communities, covering Meta's advertising products across Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, and WhatsApp.
b5db1b1d-bd21-4a33-8fe6-d5303a42bdbe.name: Meta Certified Lead Trainer

alignments.name: Candidates must adhere to these conditions to remain in the program:
alignments.description: 1.) Maintain an active Professional Meta Certification 2.) Deliver at least one training per year 3.) Report back on all of their trainings to Meta Blueprint

badge_template_activities.title: This badge indicates a candidate has successfully completed an in-depth Meta training workshop. This rigorous, hands-on workshop focuses on training and facilitation skills to empower trainers to help develop the skills of others within their respective communities.
Badged candidates can deliver training on Meta's ads products to various groups, including (but not limited to): small businesses, private and public sectors, nonprofits, and marketers.

Candidates have earned the 400-101 Meta Certified Media Planning Professional Certification or 410-101 Meta Certified Media Buying Professional Certification, proving their deep expertise across Meta's advertising solutions.

Participants completed a two-day course that covered training and facilitation skills. As part of this course they have demonstrated their ability to deliver and facilitate a Meta training based on strict criteria determined in partnership between Meta Blueprint and ATD.

628ee33a-a551-4947-8724-b4658ab9b19d.description: The Meta Certified Meta Spark Creator certification is awarded to candidates who demonstrate advanced proficiency and professional experience with Meta Spark effects and interactive experiences and possess the knowledge, skills and abilities required to develop and publish these effects and experiences.
628ee33a-a551-4947-8724-b4658ab9b19d.name: Meta Certified Meta Spark Creator

badge_template_activities.title: 700-101: The Meta Certified Meta Spark Creator certification exam validates a candidate’s ability to translate an idea into a quality interactive Meta Spark experience, including the creation, publishing and management of this experience. To earn this badge, creators must pass an exam.
The Meta Certified Meta Spark Creator certification expires after one year (12 months). To maintain this badge, a creator must either (1) re-take the exam or (2) publish three effects.

3c343efe-87ac-48dd-8a2c-e9cf12f0dfaa.description: The Meta Trainer Network teaches delivery and facilitation skills to Meta Certified individuals who want to train people and businesses in their local community. Each badged Meta Certified Digital Marketing Associate Trainer is a valued partner who has access to a growing list of resources to scale training sessions with Meta approved content to help others prepare for the Digital Marketing Associate Certification Exam.
3c343efe-87ac-48dd-8a2c-e9cf12f0dfaa.name: Meta Certified Digital Marketing Associate Trainer

alignments.name: Candidates must adhere to these conditions to remain in the program
alignments.description: • Maintain an active certification as a Meta Certified Digital Marketing Associate • Deliver at least 1 training per year • Report back on all delivered trainings to the Meta Trainer Network

badge_template_activities.title: Earn the 100-101 Meta Certified Digital Marketing Associate level certification, proving platform competency across Facebook advertising solutions.

Complete and successfully pass a 2-day Meta training workshop, demonstrating the ability to deliver and facilitate training on Meta digital marketing skills based on strict criteria. This rigorous, hands-on workshop focuses on training and facilitation skills to empower trainers to help develop the skills of others within their respective communities.

Badged candidates can deliver training on Meta tools to various groups, including (but not limited to): small businesses, private and public sector groups, nonprofits, marketers, students and educators.

15185272-04d3-4f94-bf6c-e140009fb827.description: The Meta Back-End Developer Certificate is awarded to learners who complete a series of courses on back-end development, hosted by Coursera. With a focus on Python, these rigorous, self-paced courses, developed by Meta experts, prepare a candidate for an entry level job as a back-end developer. The courses culminate in the successful completion of a capstone project.
15185272-04d3-4f94-bf6c-e140009fb827.name: Meta Back-End Developer Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Candidates are required to complete all self-paced courses on Coursera and complete and pass a capstone project.

1fc8bba9-32ca-4049-a209-044ce1500fa5.description: The Meta Certified Advertising API Specialist badge recognizes advanced competency in setting up and troubleshooting key Meta APIs for marketing, including the Marketing API, Conversions API, Conversions API Gateway, and Insights API.
1fc8bba9-32ca-4049-a209-044ce1500fa5.name: Meta Certified Advertising API Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Gain and maintain a Meta Certified Marketing Developer badge. To achieve this badge, candidates must complete the 500-101 proctored multiple choice assessment and the 500-201 coding assessment, demonstrating their ability to set up the Meta pixel, events, custom conversions, advanced matching and catalog for dynamic ads.
Complete a series of courses, learning how to create a Meta app, set up and troubleshoot the Marketing API, Conversions API, Conversions API Gateway and Insights API.

Complete a 20 question multiple choice assessment, proving advanced competency of the set up and troubleshooting of Meta's APIs for advertising, including the Marketing API, Conversions API, Conversions API Gateway and Insights API.
Complete a coding assessment in which candidates set up and debug the Conversions API.

3f011b49-dbca-4958-8258-93744ae080b5.description: Meta Certification is the highest level of accreditation that Meta recognizes. This certification is designed to identify professionals who demonstrate advanced proficiency in Meta technology and products. The Meta Certified Advertising API Developer credential is awarded to professionals competent in configuring and troubleshooting Meta Marketing API integrations.
3f011b49-dbca-4958-8258-93744ae080b5.name: Meta Certified Advertising API Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 520-101 exam, a multiple choice exam that measures proficiency in setting up and troubleshooting Meta Marketing APIs
Pass the 520-201 coding exercise, a practical coding assessment that measures proficiency in setting up integration infrastructures, creating offline event sets, and building custom audiences
Prerequisite: Meta Certified Marketing Developer certification

876ee1ec-bbb1-4a5f-9d09-12894f72a14a.description: The Meta Database Engineer Certificate is awarded to learners who complete a series of courses on database engineering, hosted by Coursera. With a focus on MySQL, these rigorous, self-paced courses, developed by Meta experts, prepare a candidate for an entry level job as a database engineer. The courses culminate in the successful completion of a capstone project.
876ee1ec-bbb1-4a5f-9d09-12894f72a14a.name: Meta Database Engineer Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Candidates need to complete self-paced courses on Coursera as well as complete and pass a capstone project.

57591e2d-ba57-4952-9e73-d8d9501a5045.description: Meta Certification is the highest level of accreditation that Meta recognizes. This certification is designed to identify professionals who demonstrate advanced proficiency in Meta technology and products. The Meta Certified Advanced Marketing Developer credential is awarded to professionals who are proficient in the technical implementation of Meta's more advanced and vertical-specific marketing solutions.
57591e2d-ba57-4952-9e73-d8d9501a5045.name: Meta Certified Advanced Marketing Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the 510-101 exam, a multiple choice exam that measures proficiency in setting up and troubleshooting App Events/SDK for iOS and Android, offline conversions, and dynamic ads for travel, real estate, and auto
Pass the 510-201 coding exercise, a practical coding assessment that measures proficiency in setting up App Events/SDK for iOS and Android
Prerequisite: Meta Certified Marketing Developer certification

b526a79b-d775-483f-b64e-ff37f95f7291.description: The Meta Certified Mobile Ad Technical Specialist badge recognizes advanced competency in the technical side of mobile advertising, including creating and configuring a Facebook app, installing the Facebook SDK, setting up and debugging app events and determining an app tagging plan.
b526a79b-d775-483f-b64e-ff37f95f7291.name: Meta Certified Mobile Ad Technical Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Gain and maintain a Meta Certified Marketing Developer badge. To achieve this badge, candidates must complete the 500-101 proctored multiple choice assessment and the 500-201 coding assessment, demonstrating their ability to set up the Meta pixel, events, custom conversions, advanced matching and catalog for dynamic ads.

Complete a series of courses, learning how to create and configure a Facebook app, install the Facebook SDK, set up and troubleshoot app events, and identify an app event tagging plan based on full funnel customer actions.
Complete a 20 question multiple choice assessment, proving advanced competency of the technical set up and troubleshooting of mobile advertising.
Complete a coding assessment in which candidates set up and debug app events for Android.

fa42dc65-c43f-48ea-bf2a-65459ac594d3.description: The Meta Android Developer Certificate is awarded to learners who complete a series of courses on Android mobile development, hosted by Coursera. With a focus on React Native and Kotlin, these rigorous, self-paced courses, developed by Meta experts, prepare a candidate for an entry level job as an Android developer. The courses culminate in the successful completion of a capstone project.
fa42dc65-c43f-48ea-bf2a-65459ac594d3.name: Meta Android Developer Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Candidates are required to complete 8 self-paced courses on Courseraas well as complete and pass a capstone project.

c620d876-2ae2-4bc1-b034-c9c01a7ccda3.description: The Meta Marketing Analyst Professional Certificate, powered by Coursera, represents people who possess the technical skills needed to give you an overall view of how your marketing campaigns are performing against business goals through data and insights. It explores analytical skills, tools, data visualization and analysis, statistics, segmentation, and measurement in marketing.
c620d876-2ae2-4bc1-b034-c9c01a7ccda3.name: Meta Marketing Analyst Professional Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Obtain the Meta Marketing Science Professional certification and maintain certification every 12 months by passing the current version of the Facebook Marketing Science certification exam.

Complete 6 courses and corresponding projects through Coursera. Courses are entirely self-paced, but most will complete the program in 20 weeks, at five hours per week. It’s entirely done online, so you can learn from anywhere at any time.

da8333c2-2d21-472e-8683-470ed13924bc.description: The Meta Full-Stack Engineer Certificate is awarded to learners who complete both the Front-end and Backend Developer certificate programs, hosted by Coursera. These rigorous, self-paced courses, developed by Meta experts, prepare a candidate for an entry level job as a full-stack developer. The courses culminate in the successful completion of capstone projects.
da8333c2-2d21-472e-8683-470ed13924bc.name: Meta Full-Stack Engineer Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Meta Front-End Developer Certificate on Coursera, a series of courses culminating in a capstone project.
Complete the Meta Back-End Developer Certificate on Coursera, a series of courses culminating in a capstone project.

2a8df5d6-f6df-4e8d-847e-b843f75b43b9.description: The Meta iOS Developer Certificate is awarded to learners who complete a series of courses on iOS mobile development, hosted by Coursera. With a focus on React Native and Swift, these rigorous, self-paced courses, developed by Meta experts, prepare a candidate for an entry level job as an iOS developer. The courses culminate in the successful completion of a capstone project.
2a8df5d6-f6df-4e8d-847e-b843f75b43b9.name: Meta iOS Developer Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Candidates must complete self-paced courses on Coursera as well as complete and pass a capstone project.

04c3b96a-063f-4be5-9a87-218a15010bb0.description: The Meta Trainer Network teaches delivery and facilitation skills to Meta Certified individuals who want to train people and businesses in their local community. Each badged trainer has exclusive access to a growing list of resources to scale training sessions with Meta approved content and is verified as a skilled instructor who can deliver focused educational sessions for candidates who want to learn more about the foundational skills of online community management.
04c3b96a-063f-4be5-9a87-218a15010bb0.name: Meta Certified Community Manager Associate Trainer

alignments.name: Candidates must adhere to these conditions to remain in the program:
alignments.description: • Maintain an active certification as a Meta Certified Community Manager • Deliver at least 1 training per year • Report back on all delivered trainings to the Meta Trainer Network

badge_template_activities.title: Earn the 600-101 Meta Certified Community Manager certification, proving advanced comprehension and strategic application of best practices and standards for online community management.

Complete and successfully pass a 2-day Meta training workshop, demonstrating the ability to deliver and facilitate training on Meta community management skills based on strict criteria. This rigorous, hands-on workshop focuses on training and facilitation skills to empower trainers to help develop the skills of others within their respective communities.

Badged candidates can deliver training on Meta tools to various groups, including (but not limited to): small businesses, private and public sector groups, nonprofits, marketers, students and educators.

a1322441-cd64-4920-8b63-14f9e84772d2.description: The Meta Generalist Software Engineer Certificate is awarded to learners who complete both the Meta Front-end and Back-End Developer Certificates, as well as the Meta Database Engineer Certificate and one of the mobile development certificates, either iOS Developer or Android Developer certificate, all hosted by Coursera. These certificate programs prepare a candidate for an entry level job as software engineer.
a1322441-cd64-4920-8b63-14f9e84772d2.name: Meta Generalist Software Engineer Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Meta Front-End Developer Certificate on Coursera, a series of courses culminating in a capstone project
Complete the Meta Back-End Developer Certificate on Coursera, a series of courses culminating in a capstone project
Complete the Meta Database Engineer Certificate on Coursera, a series of courses culminating in a capstone project
Complete either the Meta iOS Developer or Android Developer Certificate on Coursera, a series of courses culminating in a capstone project

744c95d2-9b78-4257-8872-164784473916.description: Meta Certified Technical Implementation Specialists are experts in the technical implementation and troubleshooting of key marketing technologies, including Meta Pixel, advanced matching, custom conversions, the Conversions API Gateway, Advantage+ catalog ads and offline conversions UI. These solutions support advertisers in full-funnel measurement and campaign optimization.
744c95d2-9b78-4257-8872-164784473916.name: Meta Certified Technical Implementation Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Meta Certified Media Buying Professional
Complete courses that showcase how to implement and troubleshoot the Meta Pixel, advanced matching, custom conversions, the Conversions API Gateway, Advantage+ catalog ads and offline conversions UI.
Pass an assessment upon completing the learning path.
